thread.title: Suicide bombers kill 14 in north-eastern Nigeria
thread.title_full: Suicide bombers kill 14 in north-eastern Nigeria | News24

author: news24.com
title: Suicide bombers kill 14 in north-eastern Nigeria
text:
Lagos - Four female suicide bombers killed at least 14 people in north-eastern Nigeria, the army and witnesses said on Friday.
"Four suicide bombers detonated their vests simultaneously" in the city of Maiduguri on Thursday, army spokesperson Rabe Abubakar said. He said 39 people were injured.
A local vigilante leader said the bombers were disguised as hawkers and detonated their explosives in the same neighbourhood.
"One of them targeted a crowd watching football on television while another one targeted a mosque," said the source, who spoke on the condition of anonymity.
